segments.text: There is a very critical debate between the presidential candidates tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know which channel it is on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Five I think . All three candidates are presenting their campaign platforms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to be really interested in that . But lately it seems that they end up saying one thing and doing another anyway . So why listen ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have to . If nobody listened that would be like turning our backs on our own rights and obligations to the freedoms that our forefathers fought for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes it is . Think about it . If nobody paid any attention to anything then what's it all for anyway ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get really passionate about this , don't you ? Alright . I'll watch it with you .
segments.speaker: S2
